faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about our HTML to PDF API
faq.q1: Is PDF Leaf free to use?
faq.a1: Yes! We have a generous free tier that allows 100 conversions per month with no watermark and no expiration.
faq.q2: Does it support modern CSS features?
faq.a2: Absolutely. We support Flexbox, Grid, and modern CSS3 properties. Our engine is optimized for TailwindCSS rendering.
faq.q3: How do I add page numbers?
faq.a3: Simply set 'include_page_numbers' to true in your API request, or toggle the option in the Editor.
faq.q4: Can I hide headers on the first page?
faq.a4: Yes, you can use the 'exclude_header_pages' parameter to specify pages where headers/footers should not appear.
